duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in overseeing the recruiting and onboarding process, including job postings, resume screening, and coordinating interviews.
Manage the HRIS system and maintain accurate employee records.
Support employee benefit administration, performance evaluations, and policy development.
Plan and execute special events such as benefits enrollment and organizational meetings.
Answer frequently asked questions from applicants and employees regarding standard policies and hiring processes.
Perform periodic audits of HR files and records.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree in related field required or a combination of education and/or 2 years’ experience as an HR Assistant, or relevant human resources/administrative position
